00028 
00029       uint16_t VolCur = 0x0100;     /* Volume Current Value */
00030 const uint16_t VolMin = 0x0000;     /* Volume Minimum Value */
00031 const uint16_t VolMax = 0x0100;     /* Volume Maximum Value */
00032 const uint16_t VolRes = 0x0004;     /* Volume Resolution */
00033 
00034 /*
00035  *  Audio Device Class Interface Get Request Callback
00036  *   Called automatically on ADC Interface Get Request
00037  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket and EP0Buf)
00038  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00039  */
00040 
00041 uint32_t ADC_IF_GetRequest (void) {
00042 
00043 /*
00044   Interface = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L;
00045   EntityID  = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.H;
00046   Request   = SetupPacket.bRequest;
00047   Value     = SetupPacket.wValue.W;
00048   ...
00049 */
00050 
00051   if (SetupPacket.wIndex.W == 0x0200) {
00052     /* Feature Unit: Interface = 0, ID = 2 */
00053     if (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L == 0) {
00054       /* Master Channel */
00055       switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00056         case AUDIO_MUTE_CONTROL:
00057           switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00058             case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_CUR:
00059               EP0Buf[0] = Mute;
00060               return (TRUE);
00061           }
00062           break;
00063         case AUDIO_VOLUME_CONTROL:
00064           switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00065             case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_CUR:
00066               *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = VolCur;
00067               return (TRUE);
00068             case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MIN:
00069               *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = VolMin;
00070               return (TRUE);
00071             case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MAX:
00072               *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = VolMax;
00073               return (TRUE);
00074             case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_RES:
00075               *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = VolRes;
00076               return (TRUE);
00077           }
00078           break;
00079       }
00080     }
00081   }
00082   return (FALSE);  /* Not Supported */
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 /*
00087  *  Audio Device Class Interface Set Request Callback
00088  *   Called automatically on ADC Interface Set Request
00089  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket and EP0Buf)
00090  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00091  */
00092 
00093 uint32_t ADC_IF_SetRequest (void) {
00094 
00095 /*
00096   Interface = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L;
00097   EntityID  = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.H;
00098   Request   = SetupPacket.bRequest;
00099   Value     = SetupPacket.wValue.W;
00100   ...
00101 */
00102 
00103   if (SetupPacket.wIndex.W == 0x0200) {
00104     /* Feature Unit: Interface = 0, ID = 2 */
00105     if (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L == 0) {
00106       /* Master Channel */
00107       switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00108         case AUDIO_MUTE_CONTROL:
00109           switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00110             case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR:
00111               Mute = EP0Buf[0];
00112               return (TRUE);
00113           }
00114           break;
00115         case AUDIO_VOLUME_CONTROL:
00116           switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00117             case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR:
00118               VolCur = *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf);
00119               return (TRUE);
00120           }
00121           break;
00122       }
00123     }
00124   }
00125   return (FALSE);  /* Not Supported */
00126 }
